messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Engineering Foyer.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Cargo Office.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: God Bless Cargonia and her Solemn People.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The station and her people now belong to Cargonia. Cargonia is your new nation, your new land, your new humble home. God Bless Cargonia, for heaven merely rests on top of it.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: My humble, fellow people of cargonia, please say what our next step towards the future should be

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Quarter Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: So... What do you think about an alliance Cargonia? (You will have acess to armory ;) )
